## TableColumnHookResult.isAvailable property

Indicates the availability of the column in the table.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly isAvailable: boolean;
```

## Remarks

If the property is set to `true` but the column is still not visible in the table, please make sure that it is enabled in the table configurator.
